edu.ucla.sspace.matrix
Interface SparseMatrix

All Superinterfaces:
Matrix
All Known Implementing Classes:
AtomicGrowingSparseHashMatrix, AtomicGrowingSparseMatrix, CellMaskedSparseMatrix, DiagonalMatrix, GrowingSparseMatrix, RowScaledSparseMatrix, SparseHashMatrix, SparseOnDiskMatrix, SparseRowMaskedMatrix, SparseSymmetricMatrix, SynchronizedSparseMatrix, YaleSparseMatrix
public interface SparseMatrix
extends Matrix

An interface for sparse Matrix implementations whose backing data storage permits accessing rows and columns with SparseVector objects.

Author:
DavidJurgens
See Also:
Matrix, SparseDoubleVector

Method Detail

getColumnVector

SparseDoubleVector getColumnVector(int column)
Returns the column as a sparse vector. Whether updates to the vector are written through to the backing matrix is left open to the implementation.

Specified by:
getColumnVector in interface Matrix
Parameters:
column - The column to return a DoubleVector for
Returns:
A DoubleVector representing the column at column

getRowVector

SparseDoubleVector getRowVector(int row)
Returns the row as a sparse vector. Whether updates to the vector are written through to the backing matrix is left open to the implementation.

Specified by:
getRowVector in interface Matrix
Parameters:
row - the index of row to return
Returns:
A SparseDoubleVector of the row's data
